text_direction=”default”][/split_line_heading][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_column_text css=”” max_width=”1000″ text_direction=”default”]Diversity, equity, and inclusion (DEI) are more than statements on a website — they’re commitments that shape culture, drive innovation, and create equitable opportunities. With Black History Month in October, now is the perfect time to show that your organisation’s support for diversity is more than just a headline.

Whether you’re just starting your DEI journey or looking to deepen your impact, these six practical actions can help you make meaningful change this month and <!-- This site is optimized with the Yoast SEO plugin v26.1 - https://yoast.com/wordpress/plugins/seo/ -->
